resources.string: Help us improve Ströer Messenger by sending your crash logs to the development team. Please find detailed information about crash reports in our FAQ.
Crash information available. We kindly ask you to send this information to Ströer Messenger developers and help us improving our service.
Error information available. We kindly ask you to send this information to Ströer Messenger developers and help us improving our service.
Hey! I\'m now using the free app Ströer Messenger for secure chatting. Download it now and add me as a contact:\n%1$s%2$s\n%3$s
Hey!I\'m now using the free app Ströer Messenger for secure chatting. Download it now and add me as contact:\n%1$s%2$s\n%3$s

Ströer Messenger 
- your secure multimedia messenger

Security, data protection and the protection of privacy are of extreme importance to us. Ströer Messenger sets new standards in mobile data transmission and puts mobile privacy to a whole new level, due to latest encryption and transmission technologies. Ströer Messenger provides an easy and unlimited exchange of data between smartphones and tablets, without constraining users to register and enter confidential data.

Share hugs & kisses
Please re-start Ströer Messenger to complete restoring your account.
Please copy a backup to\n%1$s\nto restore a former Ströer Messenger account.
